casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Newell, Appellant, v. Lankard Materials Laboratory, Inc.; Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Newell v. Lankard Materials Laboratory, Inc., 98 Ohio St.3d 289, 2003-Ohio-738.]

(No. 2002-0495 Submitted January 7, 2003 Decided March 5, 2003.) Jeffrey K. Newell, pro se. Jim Petro, Attorney General, and Keith D. Blosser, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook, Lundberg Stratton and O’Connor, JJ., concur.
